document.full_text: zediva inc, a startup, said it has launched a new service that lets customers watch movies over the web the same day they are released on dvd, avoiding the usual delays required by film studios.
document.title: zediva latest to try hand at streaming movie rentals
lines_and_colors: zediva inc, a startup, said it has launched a new service that lets customers watch movies over the web the same day they are released on dvd, avoiding the usual delays required by film studios.
